org.validator.utils

Class TagSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.validator.utils.TagSelector

  • public class TagSelector
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to quickly traverse a (metadata) file and return a list of values. While I experimented with XPath, SAX seems to be a (~66%) quicker way of retrieving a value from XUDML.
    Author:
    danielgalassi@gmail.com
